commands_raw:
$if GrimoryFirstTime {
Lady Gremory: Need anything - darling?
signal(set,GrimoryFirstTime,true)
-> choices
}
$else {
Lady Grimory: Well. Well.. Well... Look who's barging into other people rooms.
---
Dalian: It's for an investigation - ma'am.
---
Lady Grimory: Someone died?
---
Dalian: In the lower floor. Did you know your neightbour personally?
---
Lady Grimory: I have no connections for such low-life, I count my profession in high regards.
---
Dalian: High regards? To be renting a lower floor?
---
Lady Grimory: I was sent here by Belethara, not by my own volition.

-> choices
}
name: start

commands_raw:
Lady Grimory: I was giving Astaroth one of my books.
---
Lady Grimory: He wanted to learn more about sewing.
---
Lady Grimory: I don't know what a man has to do with that hobby.
---
Lady Grimory: But maybe he had ulterior motives.
---
Lady Grimory: Either way I ate some food, and at evening I was inside of my room sewing when I heard a gunshot around 8 PM.
signal(set,clueGun,true)
---
Dalian: Do you know who the shooter might have been?
---
Lady Grimory: All I know is that Marchosias is a war veteran. He must be the only one person with a gun.
---
Dalian: An you didn't bother to check it out?
---
Lady Grimory: Why bother to check out anything in this hell-hole.
---
Lady Grimory: Ms. Detective I say it again, these low-lifes are none of my concern.
-> choices
name: yesterday

commands_raw:
Lady Grimory: I was commisioned to this place by Belethara.
---
Lady Grimory: She wanted one of my specially made dresses.
---
Dalian: A special occasion?
---
Lady Grimory: She said it was for something... ceremonial.
---
Dalian: And when was this dress requested?
---
Lady Grimory: 3 Days ago, I arrived and spend most of my time sewing inside of this souless room.
-> choices
name: story

commands_raw:
Lady Grimory: No I wasn't.
---
Lady Grimory: I was sleeping in before you arrived.
-> choices
name: sewing

commands_raw:
?> What where you doing yesterday? -> yesterday
?> You weren't aware of the murder? -> sewing
?> Can you tell me about yourself -> story
?> Leave
name: choices
